details:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Wireshark, a network
protocol analyzer which could result in denial of service or the execution of
arbitrary code.


For the oldstable distribution (buster), [\
CVE-2021-39925](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2021-39925) has been fixed in version 2.6.20-0+deb10u2.


For the stable distribution (bullseye), these problems have been fixed in
version 3.4.10-0+deb11u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your wireshark packages.


For the detailed security status of wireshark please refer to
its security tracker page at:
[\
https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/wireshark](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/wireshark)
